asset.title: Fall/Winter 2015 O'Neill EPIC
asset.description: The Epic now has many of the same sick features as our high-end wetsuits, including 100% UltraFlex neoprene, double seal neck closure, LSD (lumbar seamless design) and re-engineered covert blackout zip. Clean graphics and sharp style lines make the Epic the best value in the industry.
asset.author: O'Neill
